Text:
Why not try self publishing the book through something like Smashwords.com? Free to do, you can sell or give away the book in a variety of ebook formats, and also possible to have them submit the book to a bunch of other eBook stores, like Amazon's Kindle market, Kobobooks.com, BN.com, Apple's iBooks, etc.

I'm not affiliated with smashwords, just wanted to try and help.
